question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology sector for the last quarter.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology sector from the CompanyInfo table.
Extract social media engagement metrics from the relevant social media detail tables for the identified companies for the last quarter.
Compile the engagement data across all social media platforms and calculate total engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for each company.
Generate a summary report comparing social media engagement across the identified technology companies for insights on performance trends.
